title: Loan assets securitised by NBFCs jump 43 pc to Rs 1.25 lakh crore last fiscal: Report - Economic Times
content: Loan assets securitised by NBFCs jump 43 pc to Rs 1.25 lakh crore last fiscal: Report  Economic Times
description: The amount of loans securitised by NBFCs (Non-Banking Financial Companies) and HFCs (Housing Finance Companies) in FY21 stood at Rs 87,300 crore, Icra Ratings said in a report. The agency expects the securitisation volume to touch the pre-Covid level of Rs 2 lakh crore in fiscal 2023-24.
